title: Separate notification channels (Ralph vs Claude)
description: Currently Ralph and Claude share the same ntfy topic, so when running multiple instances with -QN flag, the later one takes over notifications. Create separate channels: ralph-notifications for Ralph iterations, claude-notifications for Claude Code. Each should have its own topic and not interfere with each other.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Ralph uses RALPH_NTFY_TOPIC for all iteration notifications
Document how to configure separate topics in ralph-config
Multiple Ralph instances can use different topics via -t flag
Notification includes source identifier (Ralph vs Claude)
Test: two Ralph instances with different topics don't interfere
